2. PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25: This is also a material name as it is a specific type of organic compound.
3. TPD: This is a material name as it is a specific type of organic compound and is also mentioned as a minor portion in the first two material names.

The third entity, TPD, is not a clear material name as it is mentioned as a minor portion in the first two material names. It is not clear if TPD is a separate material or a component of the first two material names. Therefore, it is not included in the final table.
